name: Mining Empire
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #40

The more work you have, the worse it is!

You're the only worker on a mining station.
Station AI will give you more and more orders.
How long will you tolerate her tyranny?

Controls:
- WASD - Movement;
- '1', '2' - Select Tools;
- LMB - Use Selected Tool;
- RMB - Grab object/Throw grabbed object;
